intro: Couepia brevistaminea, commonly known as the short-stamined couepia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It produces capsule fruits that contain numerous seeds. Couepia brevistaminea is often found in moist, shaded environments within forest understories.
